title: Delta Goodrem attends Kanye West's Jesus Is King party and Sunday service
text:
It's been a busy year for Delta Goodrem with The Voice Australia and preparing for the upcoming release of her third fragrance.

But on Wednesday, the songstress, 34, took some time out to attend the album launch party for Kanye West's much-hyped ninth album Jesus Is King in Los Angeles on Wednesday.

Delta documented the event, which was held at The Forum in Inglewood, on Instagram as she sang along to one of his tracks, Follow God.

Time off: Delta Goodrem, 34, attended Kanye West's Jesus Is King album launch party in Los Angeles on Wednesday, months after attending his star-studded Sunday service in April

The 34-year-old also posted video in which she revealed she had also attended one of the rapper's hugely popular Sunday services in April.

'I was lucky enough to go to Kanye Sunday Services a few months ago. It was incredible! So I couldn't wait for the album,' the caption read on her Instagram story.

Celebrities that have attended the strictly invite-only event include Brad Pitt, Justin Bieber, Katy Perry and the Kardashian/Jenner clan.

Kanye fan: Delta documented the event, which was held at The Forum in Inglewood, on Instagram as she sang along to one of his tracks, Follow God

It comes after Delta announced the release of her third fragrance, Destiny.

Taking to Instagram earlier this month, the songstress revealed that she's been working on the new fragrance for the past 12 months.

'So excited to announce my third fragrance, Destiny!' she enthused.

'I couldn't wait for the album': Delta also revealed she attended Kanye's strictly invite-only Sunday services back in April

Popular services: Kanye performs as a rapper turned preacher as he sings songs for the strictly invite-only event

Delta released her first self-titled perfume in 2017, followed by another called Dream in 2018.

Meanwhile, Delta is gearing up to return to her judging chair on The Voice next year.

She will be joined by fellow returning judges Boy George, Guy Sebastian and Kelly Rowland.
description: It's been a busy year for Delta Goodrem with The Voice Australia and preparing for the upcoming release of her third fragrance.
authors: David Wu For Daily Mail Australia
